name: Alphonse "Bois Sec" Ardoin
description: '''Alphonse "Bois Sec" Ardoin''' (November 16, 1915 â€“ May 16, 2007) was a [[Louisiana Creole people|Creole]] [[accordionist]] who specialized in the Creole music called "la la music" or "la musique Creole" (closely related to [[Cajun music]]) and was influential in what became [[zydeco music]].
